propertyGroup.name: Outlet
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which output is generated.

property.name: facade-logics
property.documentation: The location to which metafacade logic classes are generated.

property.name: facade-logic-impls
property.documentation: The directory to which metafacade logic implementation classes are generated.

property.name: facades
property.documentation: The location to which metafacade interfaces are generated.

property.name: facades-to-impls
property.documentation: The directory to which the metafacade-impls.properties file is generated.

property.name: implementationOperationNamePattern
property.documentation: The pattern used to the create the implementation name for metafacade operations that perform the logic of attributes, association ends, and operations, where {0} represents the operation name

property.name: metamodelVersionPackage
property.documentation: This is the package to which the metafacade 'Logic' classes are generated. For example for the UML 1.4 metafacades we set this property to org.andromda.metafacades.uml14, for UML 1.3 we'd set it to org.andromda.metafacades.uml13, etc).

property.name: generalizationNamePattern
property.documentation: The pattern used for constructing the generalize name for the delegated generalizations (these are exposed to the child metafacade implementation class when a metafacade extends more than one other metafacade). {0} is the name of the generalization (or type if the name has not been specified).
